issues.description: No size limit check for file uploads in on_part_data method, could lead to unbounded memory usage
Type annotation issue with SpooledTemporaryFile being passed to UploadFile
No error handling for invalid JSON in json method, could lead to uncaught exceptions
Problematic CancelScope usage in is_disconnected method, cancelling immediately after creation
Cannot access attribute 'encode' for class 'bytearray' in StreamingResponse.stream_response
